extends java.lang.Object
    The application's window instance.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Chris Stroud (clstroud@ncsu.edu)

      UI element for listing all possible base commits and allowing for selection

      UI element for listing all commits made since the selected base commit.
      (package private) java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> newListModel
      Model structure used for storing a subset of the commitLists which correspond to all commits made since the selected base commit
      (package private) javax.swing.JTextPane newMsgTextPane
      UI element for displaying the message for the selected "new" commit

      • newList

        javax.swing.JList newList
        UI element for listing all commits made since the selected base commit. Displays all commits if no base has been selected yet.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        private void init()
        Initialize the contents of the frame.

      • updateNewListModel

        void updateNewListModel(int idx)
        Updates the "new" commits list such that its contents are limited to only those commits starting at or after the given index of the baseListModel.
        Parameters:
        idx - The base index for restricting "new" commits.

      • updateBaseListModel

        void updateBaseListModel()
        Updates the model for the base list UI, then subsequently the model for the "new" list UI.

      • updateNewListUI

        void updateNewListUI()
        Populates the list of candidate "new" commits. Ensures that the list only displays commits that are more recent than the selected base commit.

      • updateBaseListUI

        private void updateBaseListUI()
        Populates the list of candidate "Base" commits, then subsequently the "new" commits.

                               throws java.awt.HeadlessException
